item.text: The Lord instructed Joshua:

“<st data-num="01696 0413 0559">Have</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">select</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> of <st data-num="04733" class="">refuge</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="01696" class="">told</st> you <st data-num="0413" class="">about</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">through</st> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st>.

<st data-num="07523" class="">Anyone</st> who <st data-num="07684 01097 01847">accidentally</st> <st data-num="05221" class="">kills</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">someone</st> can <st data-num="05127" class="">escape</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>;<n id="1" /> these cities will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="04733" class="">place of asylum</st> from the <st data-num="01350" class="">avenger</st> of <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st>.

The one who committed manslaughter<n id="1" /> should <st data-num="05127" class="">escape</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>, <st data-num="05975" class="">stand</st> at the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>, and <st data-num="01696" class="">present</st> his <st data-num="01697" class="">case</st> <st data-num="0241" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02205" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>.<n id="2" /> They should then <st data-num="0622 0413">bring</st> him into the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> him a <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> to stay, and let him <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">there</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="03588" class="">When</st> the <st data-num="01350" class="">avenger</st> of <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="07291" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> him, they must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05462" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">over to</st> him the one who <st data-num="07523" class="">committed manslaughter</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> he <st data-num="01097 01847">accidentally</st> <st data-num="05221" class="">killed</st> his <st data-num="07453" class="">fellow man</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">without</st> <st data-num="08130 01931 08543 08032">premeditation</st>.<n id="1" />
He must remain in that city until his case is decided by the assembly, and the high priest dies. Then the one who committed manslaughter may return home to the city from which he escaped.”
So they selected Kedesh in Galilee in the hill country of Naphtali, Shechem in the hill country of Ephraim, and Kiriath Arba (that is, Hebron) in the hill country of Judah.

<st data-num="05676" class="">Beyond</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> <st data-num="04217" class="">east</st> of <st data-num="03405" class="">Jericho</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="05414" class="">selected</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01221" class="">Bezer</st> in the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> on the <st data-num="04334" class="">plain</st> belonging to the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="07205" class="">Reuben</st>, <st data-num="07216" class="">Ramoth</st> in <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> belonging to the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st>, and <st data-num="01474" class="">Golan</st> in <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st> belonging to the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st>.

These were the cities of refuge appointed for all the Israelites and for resident foreigners living among them. Anyone who accidentally killed someone could escape there and not be executed by the avenger of blood, at least until his case was reviewed by the assembly.
